item.title: Peppermint Sugar Cookies for Holidays
item.description: Indulge in the festive spirit with these delightful peppermint sugar cookies! Their melt-in-your-mouth texture combined with a refreshing minty flavor makes them an irresistible treat for holiday gatherings. Bake a batch today and share the joy with your loved ones!

  • 2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 1/2 cups white sugar
  • 1 egg
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/2 teaspoon peppermint extract
  • 1/4 cup crushed peppermint candies

  1. Preheat oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt.
  3. In another bowl, cream together butter and sugar until smooth.
  4. Beat in the egg, vanilla extract, and peppermint extract.
  5. Gradually blend in the dry ingredients.
  6. Fold in crushed peppermint candies.
  7. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets.
  8. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden.
  9. Cool on wire racks.
